scripts.build-topojson: node ./src/scripts/build-topojson && cp src/scripts/map-data.topo.json src/data/map-data.topo.json && cp src/scripts/map-data.topo.json public/map-data.topo.json
scripts.build: npm run heroku-github-setup && npm run deploy
scripts.heroku-github-setup: git init && git config --global user.email rhysh@live.com && git config --global user.name heroku_bot && git remote add origin git@github.com:Anemy/how-far-south.git
